overview: Chris had lived a pretty normal life until his parents decide he was their only way out of some really serious debt. One day away from eviction and a life on the streets, he agrees to make the ultimate sacrifice to save his family from poverty. To get them out of this nightmare situation he has to be bound, beaten, buggered and burnt. He must submit, whimper, and take the pain until the cash is raised and the debt paid.
title: Bound by Debt
